name: Mood Ring Generator
description: Generate a random mood ring color and its associated meaning with a click.  Relive the nostalgic fun of mood rings digitally!
features: Clickable button to generate a new mood color.
Display of the generated color using Tailwind CSS background utilities.
Display of the color's corresponding mood meaning.
Simple, clean design using Tailwind's pre-built components.
Option to copy the mood/color combination to the clipboard.
